title: Held: Alia's Story
description: Freed from the training facility she was held in against her will, Alia can think of nothing except getting back to her home planet where she was a warrior, an equal to men.Unfortunately, getting home is a difficult endeavour and she has to be patient.Patience doesn't come easy to Alia, and Ian finds he often has to step in and take her in hand to keep her from endangering herself and others.And he has no issue to taking her to task.Warning: Adults only material. Involves spanking, forced punishments.This is part of a series-Taken Risa's story (pt 1 and 2) come first in the series. You don't need to read them first but it probably helps.
author: Laylah Roberts
